name: Penitent

skills.name: Sword of Faith
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 1 enemy 2 times. Has a 30% chance of placing a 25% [Decrease ATK] debuff for 1 turn.
Damage based on: [ATK]
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Damage +5%
Lvl. 4 Buff/Debuff C
Lvl. 5 Buff/Debuff Chance +10'
Lvl. 6 Damage +10%

skills.name: Counter
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 1 enemy. Places a [Counterattack] buff on this Champion for 1 turn.
Damage based on: [ATK]
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Damage +5%
Lvl. 4 Damage +5%
Lvl. 5 Cooldown -1

skills.name: Unshakable Faith
skills.raw_description: Removes all debuffs from this Champion. Places a buff on this Champion for 3 turns.
